attributes.action: Begin to use income tax as the primary means to raise revenue.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If revenue needs to be raised in our society, we are prepared to recognise the responsibility of those who are earning the most out of that society, to pay for the upkeep of that society.  In other words if times for the country are tight, those with the most income contribute the greater proportion.  
Stop using stealth taxes and begin to be up-front and honest,
